Terminess/Vulois/Bronco and Octociz

Terminess brought the pod into her lab. She was about to start 
building it, but she saw Vulois and Battera and listened to what he 
had to say.

______________________________________________________________________

Before Vulois started talking, he checked the lab for bugs. He found 
two and crushed them in his hand. He than began talking.

"Looks like our friend Hell Beast doesn't trust us, eh? Anyway,  I 
was going to wait for Soundwave but I can tell him later. We have a 
new plan. Battera, I know you weren't interested in ruling, but I 
need your help on this if we want to go home. All this while we are 
going to act like loyal Predacons to Hell Beast, building our ship to 
go home just like we told him. But were going to make up some 
probelms that the ship won't work, which will have to make us stay 
for awhile. Then, when Hell Beast is about to win the Neo Beast Wars, 
which he will, we start a mutiny. Us, and other Predacons that we 
persuaded fro, Hell Beast. We take the Preds and win the Neo Beast 
Wars. We then take the TM3 Driver, betray the other Predacons and the 
four of us take off in our ship for home. Once home, we will use the 
TM3 driver to make the Preds stronger and rule Cybertron. Any of you 
may join my ruling council, or you may go on with normal lives. I 
will not hold offense to you for that. But I need your co-operation. 
This will be your last chance to back out. Are you with me or not?"

______________________________________________________________________

Bronco looked at Iron Raptor and smiled. He may be ruthless, but he 
would give the Spark.

"Here, catch!!"

Just before Bronco throws the spark to IR, it starts to rumble. It 
breaks out of the holder and starts floating in the air.

"What?!? You're supposed to die when you're out of that!"

The Spark goes full throtle into the chest of Bronco. He falls to the 
ground, limp. In a few moments he gets back up, smiling. But not that 
evil, sinister smile. A real, honourable smile.

"Iron Raptor, this is Octociz. I have placed my spark in the body of 
Bronco. He has a strange passed which I want to help clear up. I 
believe he may be a Maximal. I have not merged sparks with him, his 
body is just holding the two sparks. Please..don't...."

A pain came over Octociz/Bronco. His body was not meant for two 
sparks. It began to grow. His bull torso became that of a horse, and 
his head area grew up straight into that of a human with horns. He 
had become a cenataur.

"Wow.....anyway, please don't interfere. I want to make contact with 
the real Bronco and see if I can bring out the Maximal. I will make 
contact in a few weeks. Thankyou for coming."

Octociz and Bronco, one enourmous powerful body, rode off towards 
Bronco's cave area.

(OOC: I leave for vacation on Friday, and graduation on Thursday, so 
this will be the last appearance of Octociz and Bronco until I get 
back. I want to finish off a few things for Vulois and Terminess by 
Wednesday. You will all be surprised by the Bronco/Octociz story. If 
you read the char page, you will know who Bronco is, but they way 
they find out will change them both forever.)
